casebody.data:
Kerry BIGELOW & Clyde Clark, Plaintiffs,
v.
TOWN OF CHAPEL HILL & Roger Stancil, in his official capacity as Manager of the Town of Chapel Hill and in his personal capacity insofar as he was operating outside of his job description, Defendants. No. COA15-897. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. May 3, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed.
